trans-unit.source: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"></xref> interface to a consumer expecting data through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Overfører data i en webdeler tilkobling fra en leverandør som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"> </xref> grensesnittet til en forbruker forventer data ved hjelp av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringer brukes til å oversette data mellom to webdeler kontroller med inkompatible tilkoblingen punkt.

trans-unit.source: A RowToFieldTransformer object transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer requiring data from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for RowToFieldTransformer overfører data fra en leverandør implementering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>grensesnittet til en forbruker krever data fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>

trans-unit.source: The RowToFieldTransformer class allows controls with these incompatible connection points to be connected.
trans-unit.target: Klassen RowToFieldTransformer tillater kontroller med disse inkompatible tilkoblingen peker til kobles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref> transformer in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Viser en ASP.NET-kontroll som konfigurerer en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"> </xref> transformeringen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> sone.

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Kan opprette tilkobling webdeler statisk eller dynamisk.

trans-unit.source: A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` tag.
trans-unit.target: En statisk tilkobling er definert i den `<StaticConnections>` koden.

trans-unit.source: A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a web page and the user is in the connect mode.
trans-unit.target: En bruker kan definere en dynamisk kobling når en Tilkoblingssone er inkludert i en webside og brukeren i connect-modus.

trans-unit.source: When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en dynamisk kobling definerer brukeren tilkoblingen via en konfigurasjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: The CreateConfigurationControl method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateConfigurationControl returnerer kontrollen som brukeren samhandler med til å definere tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The configuration control for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object allows a user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row to connect with the data field of the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonskontroll for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>objekt kan brukeren koble eller koble fra en leverandør og forbruker, og Velg hvilket felt fra leverandøren-raden til å kommunisere med datafeltet av forbrukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>

trans-unit.source: It is displayed in the connections zone.
trans-unit.target: Den vises i sonen.

trans-unit.source: The user's configuration settings will be saved, and loaded on the next visit.
trans-unit.target: Brukerens konfigurasjonsinnstillinger lagres, og lastes inn på kan du gå til neste.

trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET control that configures a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ASP.NET-kontroll som konfigurerer en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på verdien som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: The FieldName property represents the data from the provider row that will be transformed for the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen feltnavn representerer dataene fra leverandøren-raden som skal transformert for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The FieldName property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToFieldTransformer FieldName="`*selectedField*`" />` tag, where *selectedField* contains the name of the field to transform.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen feltnavn kan angis av brukeren fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>konfigurasjonskontroll eller sett deklarativt i den `<asp:RowToFieldTransformer FieldName="` *selectedField* `" />` koden, der *selectedField* inneholder navnet på feltet til transformeringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the field to transform.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på feltet som transformeringen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien av feltet som brukes av grensesnittet som grunnlag for en tilkobling mellom to webdeler-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The delegate instance to be used when retrieving a value.
trans-unit.target: Representanten-forekomsten som skal brukes under henting av en verdi.

trans-unit.source: callback equals .
trans-unit.target: callbackequals .

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter skjemainformasjon for et datafelt som brukes til å dele data mellom to webdeler-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> describing the data schema.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> som beskriver dataskjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Provides an object for transforming the data.
trans-unit.target: Gir et objekt for transformering dataene.

trans-unit.source: The Transform method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> so it can be used by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden transformering gir et objekt for transformering leverandøren dataene fra typen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>til typen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField>slik at den kan brukes av forbrukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>

trans-unit.source: The provider data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren dataene som skal gjøres om.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer dataene som skal transformeres.</xref:System.Object>
